name: SANDbox (Mason Cowan)
description:
SANDbox is a Simple Tile-Based Physics Game.

THIS GAME IS VERY LAGGY. IT IS NOT RECOMMENDED FOR THOSE WITH WEAK PCs!!

Now have some text ripped straight out of the README file:

VV IMPORTANT CRAP VV -

    First of all, this game is bad.

    By that I mean it's VERY LIKELY TO CRASH/FREEZE/LAG

    To lower the likelyhood of SANDbox laggin and stuff,

        1. DO NOT drop sand into the void (below the window)

        It's okay with small amounts, but when you do a lot at a time,

VV CONTROLS VV - 

    LEFT CLICK      = Place Selected Tiles

    RIGHT CLICK     = Remove Tiles in Given Area

    SCROLL WHEEL    = Cycle Through Selection

    SELECTION LEGEND -

        0   = Sand Tile (Has Realistic-ish Sand Physics and Can Make Piles)

        1   = Rock Tile (Solid Block That Slowly Crumbles from Bombs)

        2   = Bomb Object (Bomb That Falls and Explodes Whatever it Touches)

        3   = Hourglass Object (Literally an Hourglass [no joke] )

            it's kinda cool to see what happens when you fill an hourglass with sand then delete it
